  • Mobile-optimized touch controls with portrait/landscape layouts and responsive canvas

Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring real-time collaboration, mobile touch controls, and persistent world saves. Players explore procedurally generated underground environments, mine resources, upgrade equipment, and interact with others through an MQTT-based networking system. The game includes a comprehensive shop system, admin controls, and cloud synchronization for cross-device progress.
